entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of snow early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
